topic.title: URL Chooser Form Control
topic.shortdesc: The oxy_urlChooser built-in form control is used for a dialog box that allows you to select the location of local or remote resources. The inserted reference is made relative to the URL of the currently open editor.

body.note: To insert a sample of the oxy_urlChooser form control in a CSS file (or LESS file), invoke the Content Completion Assistant by pressing and select the oxy_urlChooser code template.
